# ditwahLandslide

## Installation

You can install the development version of ditwahLandslide from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("thiyangt/ditwahLandslide")
```

## Example



```{r example}
library(ditwahLandslide)
head(ditwah_landslides_warnings)
```
